content: add a touch of nature and fall inspired decor with this quick and easy leaf coaster pattern the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials** * worsted weight cotton yarn * 5mm crochet hook * yarn needle scissors the finished item measures approximately 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm tall item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/fallen-leaves-coaster-crochet-pattern/
